mehidi shri lankawata pamini sancharakayan athara, wayasa awu. 40-49 athara wu wayas kanda wala sancharakayange paminime pahadili wardhanayak daknata thibe. 2002 di 16.8% kwu prathishathaya 2010 di 28.9% k dakwa ihala nanwi thibimath wayasa awu 3 - 12 athara wu daruwange paminima warsha 2002 7.6% k wu athara 2011 di 11.6 % k dakwa wadiwimenda peni yanne meratata pawul pitin paminena sancharakayange pahadili wardhanayak daknata labimaya.

anek sebalunge watup gewima sidu nowunu athara 1882di karalikara sebalun japan niladharinta pahara dun athara rajinata aarakshawa patha pitisara pedesakata pala yamata sidu wiya. 1894di, donhak gowi wiplawaya sidu wu athara gowi nayakayaku wu jon bon-jun yatathe nagi aa gowihu 1894 janawari 11wana dina, go-bu hi satane di pradeshiya palakayaku wu jo byon-gap paradawa ohuge wathkam gowin athara beda dunha.

siddhiya samba­ndha­yen seru­nu­wara poli­siya wisin pari­kshana kata­yuthu aarambha kara athi athara, adala sthanaye bim bomba iwath kirime kata­yuthu thawa­ka­li­kawa nawatha damana lesa bim bomba iwath kirime sanwi­dha­na­yata danum di athi bawath seru­nu­wara polis sthana­dhi­pathi polis pari­kshaka aananda herath kiya siti­yeya.

pasugiya rajaya samayedi krida aramudalen ayata dimanawak gewu athara aya ema dimanawa labagena mahinda rajapakshage deshapalana katayuthu walata sahaya wuwa misa kridawe sanwardhanayata sidukala mehewarak natha.
pilibandawa danaganimata widyagnyayo boho kalayaka sita noyek aakaraye paryeshana ha adhyanayan magin uthsaha dara thibe.
shri lanka rupiyale agaya asimanthika lesa pahala yamata ek hethuwak wanne anawashya paridi rathran meratata aanayanaya kirima bawa aarthika wishleshakayo pawasathi.
mema yugalaye pradhanathama anawakiya wuye samanthara chalanayak wana athara, yugalaya sathiye palamu bhagaye itha patu agayaka gaman karanu athi bawata prakasha wiya.
ehema kiwwata mokada piyumi eka deyak nisa thaman ganama lajja wenawa.
deweni eka hinawela andanna oona ekak...
me dariyan kurunagala,alawwa,thambauththegama,dangolla,pasyala ha mahanuwara pradeshawala padinchikaruwanya. .
eth kawadawath igena ganna ekeknam sitiya kiya mathakayak natha.
me samithiyata oona wenawa maduwak hadaganna takaran kola tikak.
ohu nawatha ena bawa daninanm numbaa bala sitiyata kamak na
basilta sar kiyanawa.
me thiyenne prasna walin samaharak...
chandrika kumarathunga ha maithripala sirisena (mohuta janadhipathi wu pamanin paksha sabhapathikama himiwanne naha.)
ekama yuddayak ethana.
dan komeyi dan waladanne dan kattiyage pradhana prashnaya aanandata kelawanne kohomada kiyana ekaya....
onna ohe banapuden.
wena tharunayeku nam methanin ehata siduwima nodakka se iwatha bala hari yanu atha.
appamado amathapadan apramadawa katayuthu karannatayi niwan dakinnata puluwan.
wadagath thorathuru tikak yaluwa..

ithin mata dinesh gana wisthara pawasu pera sadahan kala yahaluwa kuda kala dinaka ape gam pradeshayata ithamathma samipa “walla”, pagimata “thaniwama” gos siti awasthawaka chandimal da walle bola gasamin sita atha.
eya tharamak parassamin kala yuthu wanne ekwarama obe watina durakathanaya wisiwi ya haki nisayi.
ohu wiwidha rasawindanathmaka dewal wala deshaka yek widiyata katayuthu karana wita prekshakayanta widawak na.
me wage kotama nathi parm kondayak thibunu kannadi palandina mis wandalan ape ammata wada godak balayayi ee kalayeth mata hithunu tichar keneki.

emenma thakshanaya bhawitha karamin adhyapana kshetha්raya diyunu kirimata sha්ri lankawa gena athi uthsahaya pilibandawada eksath jathinge manawa himikam samuluwe 20 weni sasiwaraya sandaha sha්ri lankawa idiripath kala warthawen danuwath kara thibenawa.
pora hena kukula...
namuth bahutharayak aththe kisi wadagammakata nomathi samada sihina pamanak lesa athi eewaya.
mala sirure thuwala kisiwak nothibu bawath aya kumana aakarayaka ho lingika athawarayakata lak wi nositi bawath adhikarana waidya niladhariya wadidurath kiya sitiyeya.
